directions: Mash the strawberries. Then put a teaspoon of mashed strawberries into a wine glass.
Use a balloon whisk to mix cream cheese, icing sugar and whipping to a creamy texture.
Put 2 tbsp of cream over the mashed strawberries.
Arrange fresh strawberries over the cream and dust with icing sugar.
Chill this for at least 2 hrs and serve.
Note: Make sure your cream is 3/4 full. You need space to arrange strawberries on top of it.
title: Snowy Strawberry
